org.instantplaces.purewidgets.client.widgets
Class GuiTagCloud

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              org.instantplaces.purewidgets.client.widgets.GuiTagCloud
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasAttachHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget
public class GuiTagCloud
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite

The tag cloud widget is a visual representation of a tag cloud. This is a client-only, output-only, widget.

CSS Style Rules

.instantplaces-GuiTagCloud
the outer <div> element
.instantplaces-GuiTagCloud .tag
the <span> element for each word
The component elements (.caption and .referencecode) also keep the GWT style name (gwt-Html).

Author:
Jorge C. S. Cardoso

maxFrequency

private int maxFrequency
The calculated maximum frequency on the current list of tags.

minFrequency

private int minFrequency
The calculated minimum frequency on the current list of tags.

maxFontSize

private int maxFontSize
The maximum font size for the tags. Tag frequency is normalized and assigned a font size by linear interpolation between min and max font size.

minFontSize

private int minFontSize
The minimum font size for the tags. Tag frequency is normalized and assigned a font size by linear interpolation between min and max font size.

panel

private com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.FlowPanel panel
The outer panel that holds the tags
